import React, {useState} from "react"; function AboutImg(){ const [Hover, setHover] = useState(false); // let Hover = useState() function IconHover(x){ console.log(x) x.style.color = x.getAttribute('color'); } return(
{setHover(true)}} onMouseOut={()=>setHover(false)} style={Hover ? {color:'#0057ff'} : null } className="fab fa-behance"> {setHover(true)}} onMouseOut={()=>setHover(false)} style={Hover ? {color:'#55277e'} : null } className="fab fa-github" color="">
); } export default AboutImg;
